subtasks.title: Research Background
subtasks.description: Conduct thorough research on the background of the project.

subtasks.title: Draft Proposal Outline
subtasks.description: Create an outline for the project proposal, including key sections.

subtasks.title: Design Slides
subtasks.description: Design slides for the presentation with appropriate visuals.

subtasks.title: Practice Presentation
subtasks.description: Rehearse the presentation multiple times to ensure smooth delivery.

subtasks.title: Create Wireframes
subtasks.description: Design wireframes for the website layout and structure.

subtasks.title: Develop Frontend
subtasks.description: Build the frontend using React.js and Tailwind CSS.

subtasks.title: Integrate Backend
subtasks.description: Connect the frontend to the backend services and APIs.
